hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y git wget unzip openjdk-8-jdk
wget https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-4.2-bin.zip unzip gradle-4.2-bin.zip
cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/apache/kafka cd kafka git checkout 1.0.0
cp build.gradle build.gradle.orig sed -i '354d ' build.gradle sed -i "354i \ \jvmArgs = ['-Xss256m'] + maxPermSizeArgs" build.gradle sed -i "375i \ \maxHeapSize = '4g'" build.gradle git diff
export PATH=$PATH:$WORK_DIR/gradle-4.2/bin export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-s390x export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
gradle gradle jar
cp $WORK_DIR/kafka/checkstyle/checkstyle.xml $WORK_DIR/kafka/checkstyle/checkstyle.xml.orig sed -i "s|checkstyle/java.header|$WORK_DIR/kafka/checkstyle/java.header|" $WORK_DIR/kafka/checkstyle/checkstyle.xml sed -i "s|checkstyle/suppressions.xml|$WORK_DIR/kafka/checkstyle/suppressions.xml|" $WORK_DIR/kafka/checkstyle/checkstyle.xml git diff
sudo apt-get install -y libsnappy-dev libbz2-dev curl gcc g++ make cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb.git cd rocksdb git checkout v5.7.3 sed -i -e "s/-march=native/-march=z196/" build_tools/build_detect_platform sed -i -e "s/-momit-leaf-frame-pointer/-DDUMBDUMMY/" Makefile PORTABLE=1 make shared_lib make rocksdbjava
cd $WORK_DIR/rocksdb/java/target/ cp rocksdbjni-5.7.3-linux64.jar rocksdbjni-5.7.3-linux64.jar.backup jar -xf rocksdbjni-5.7.3-linux64.jar cp librocksdbjni-linux64.so librocksdbjni-linux32.so jar -ufv rocksdbjni-5.7.3-linux64.jar librocksdbjni-linux32.so jar -tf rocksdbjni-5.7.3-linux64.jar mv rocksdbjni-5.7.3-linux64.jar rocksdbjni-5.7.3.jar cp -vf rocksdbjni-5.7.3.jar $WORK_DIR/kafka/streams/examples/build/dependant-libs-2.11.11/ cp -vf rocksdbjni-5.7.3.jar $WORK_DIR/kafka/streams/build/dependant-libs-2.11.11/ cp -vf rocksdbjni-5.7.3.jar $HOME/.gradle/caches/modules-2/files-2.1/org.rocksdb/rocksdbjni/5.7.3/421b44ad957a2b6cce5adedc204db551831b553d/
cd $WORK_DIR/kafka gradle test --continue 2>&1 | tee testlog.log
sed -i 's/-XX:+UseG1GC//' bin/kafka-run-class.sh
nohup bin/zookeeper-server-start.sh -daemon config/zookeeper.properties & sleep 5m nohup bin/kafka-server-start.sh -daemon config/server.properties & sleep 5m ps -aux
bin/kafka-topics.sh --create --zookeeper localhost:2181 --replication-factor 1 --partition 1 --topic test sleep 5m bin/kafka-topics.sh --list --zookeeper localhost:2181 sleep 5m echo -e "Congratulations\nThe build is working\n\nWelcome to Apache Kafka with Linux on z Systems\n" > /tmp/msg.log bin/kafka-console-producer.sh --broker-list localhost:9092 --topic test < /tmp/msg.log sleep 5m bin/kafka-console-producer.sh --broker-list localhost:9092 --topic test < /tmp/msg.log sleep 5m
bin/kafka-console-consumer.sh --zookeeper localhost:2181 --topic test --from-beginning --max-messages 4 > $WORK_DIR/output.txt sleep 5m cat $WORK_DIR/output.txt echo "Welcome to Apache Kafka with Linux on z Systems" >> expectedoutput.txt grep "Welcome to Apache Kafka with Linux on z Systems" $WORK_DIR/output.txt > actualoutput.txt cat expectedoutput.txt cat actualoutput.txt kill -9 $(ps aux | grep 'kafka' | awk '{print $2}')| awk '{print $2}' if diff -u -w expectedoutput.txt actualoutput.txt ; then echo "Success" exit 0 else exit 1 fi
